news.content:
üóû ThreeFold‚Äôs Green Technology Strategy to a Fairer, More Sustainable World

‚ÄúWe have the potential to offset energy usage 100 per cent by the end of 2021, and our goal is to take two times more carbon out of the air than we put in,‚Äù says, Kristof de Spiegeleer, co-founder of ThreeFold.

Full article here

If you want to read more about ThreeFold energy savings, dive into our wiki!

next.title: What's Possible on Grid 2
next.excerpt: While we work to open testing of Grid 3.0, we wanted to outline what's already available to test on Grid 2.
